resources.string: Get started by inserting an entry.
The key gets hashed and the slot index is calculated:\nhash(*%1$s*) = *%2$s*\n*%2$s* mod *%3$s* = *%4$s*
Now we move to the calculated slot %4$s and check if it is occupied.
The entry has been successfully inserted.
The load factor has been exceeded, therefore the hash map has been resized.
The slot is occupied. Checking if the keys are equal.
The key is the same as your entry\'s key.
The entry for your key *%1$s* has been found. It has the value *%6$s*.
The entry you searched for was not found.
The key is not the same as your entry\'s key.
We move %5$s step(s) forward to the next slot.
